verses.content: Hienghai hi a nih Israel thla- haiin Kanaan ram an lâk, thiempu Eleazar hai, Nun naupa Josua hai, Israel thlahai hnam sûng- kaw puipahaiin an rochan dinga an lo semhai chu.
An rochan chu, LALPAIN Mosie thu a lo pêk ta angin, aisânin hnam kuo le hnam zâtve hai ta dinga sem a nih.
Mosie chun hnam hni le hnam zâtvehai kha Jordan râla khan an rochan ding a lo pêk ta sih a; Levi chihai ruok chu anni lai an rochan ding a pêk ve nawh.
Josef thlahai chu hnam hni an na, Manasse le Ephraim chu; Levi chihai chu chu rama chun chanpuol an pêk ve nawh, an umna ding khaw- puihai le a khawkâwl vêl ran ruol tlatna hmun ding ti chau naw chu.
LALPAIN Mosie thu a lo pêk ta ang khan Israel thlahai chun an thawh a, ram chu an sem a.

Chuongchun, Juda thlahai chu Gilgalah Josua kuomah an va feh a, Keniz mi Jephunne naupa Kaleb chun a kuomah, “Kades-barneaa Pathien mi Mosie kuoma LALPAIN ka chungchâng le nanga chungchâng thu a hril kha i hriet a.
LALPA siehlaw Mosien Kades- barneaa inthawka ram va enthla dinga a mi tir lai khan kum sâwmli mi ka ni tah a; chun, ka lungrila um ang chie chu a kuoma khan kân tlun nâwk a.
Amiruokchu, ka unau kei le fe vehai khan mipuihai lungril an suk- tuipêk a, kei ruok chun chu LALPA ka Pathien chu titakzetin ka zui tlat a.
Chuongchun, chu ni chun Mosien, ‘LALPA ka Pathien hi titakzeta i zui tlat leiin i kein a lo sir ta ram chu kumkhuoin nangma le i thlahai rochan ding ni ngei ngei a tih,’ tiin ṭawng ân khâm a.

Ngai ta, LALPAIN Mosie kuom- a chuong thuhai chu a hrila inthawk Israelhai thlalêra an invâk an invâk sûng po po, kum sâwmli panga zet chu a lo hril ta angin LALPA chun a mîn damtir tah a; chuongchun, ngai ta, tuhin kum sâwmriet panga ka lo ni tah a.
Chuong sa khawm chun tu chen hin Mosien a mi tir lai ang el khan ka la hrât zing a, inhmaa indona ding le suok invâkna dinga thahrui ka nei ang khan tu khawm hin ka la nei zing i sawnnaw.

Chuongchun, hi tlâng LALPAIN kha nia a lo hril ta kha mi pe el ta la, khânga Anakim mihai an um a, an khawpuihai khawm a ropuiin kula inhuon khup a nih ti kha nia khan i hriet kha, LALPA chun mi umpuiin, anni chu ka hnawt suok thei rawi mawh, LALPAIN a lo hril ta ang khan,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Josua chun ama chu mal a sâwm a; Jephunne naupa Kaleb chu a rochan dingin Hebron chu a pêk tah a.
Chuleiin, Hebron chu tu chen hin Keniz mi, Jephunne naupa Kaleb rochan a hung ni tah a nih, LALPA Israelhai Pathien chu titakzeta a zui tlat leiin.
Hebron khuo hming chu a hma chun Kiriath-arba a na, Arba chu Anakim mihai laia mi lientak a nih. Chuongchun, ram chu râlmuongin a um hri taphawt a.
